title: California Independent Monitor, 2012-2014:  Financial disclosures filed by, Forms 805 filed in regards to

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1.  Any financial disclosures filed by Katherine Porter, relative to her appointment as California's Independent Monitor, tasked with overseeing banks' compliance with the National Mortgage Settlement.  This should include any disclosure filed while she was being approved for the position, any assuming office disclosure, any annual disclosures and any leaving-office disclosure.

2. Any Agency Report of Consultants (FPPC Form 805) filed by the CA Department of Justice or one of its departments, including the "Office of the California Monitor," pertaining to the retention of Katherine Porter as Independent Monitor.

TIME FRAME:  Porter served as Independent Monitor from 2012 through 2014, but please include any disclosures or Forms 805 pertaining to her appointment that may have been filed at a later date.

NOTE:  For verification of her appointment, please see the OAG announcement dated March 16, 2012 (https://oag.ca.gov/news/press-releases/attorney-general-kamala-d-harris-appoints-independent-monitor-protect-interests)

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.
